TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: v0.61 Initial draft published October 2023 v0.62 January 2024 The Nursing care needs standard has undergone a clinical terminology review; group level data items have an observable entity code, when available, tagged and the coded value field only contains a Finding code, with a free text option. This structures the data items in the model as an inferred question and answer in the system, with free text as an option. Within the Elimination group, the Elimination item has been removed and replaced with four new data concepts to align with the existing SNOMED CT codes, including Toileting capability, baseline toileting capability, continence capability and baseline continence capability. v1.0 Final version February 2024 Implementation guidance and coded value fields updated

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Eating and Drinking

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: This is an eating and drinking record entry. There may be 0 to many record entries under a section. Each record entry is made up of a number of elements or data items.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information regarding whether the person is capable of, and typically attends to their own, eating and drinking needs.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Coded value: Independent (Able to carry out all usual activities). Slight disability (Able to look after own affairs without assistance, but unable to carry out all previous activities.) Moderate disability (Requires some help, but is able to do physically carry out activities unassisted). Moderately severe disability (Unable to attend to needs without assistance). Severe disability (Requires constant nursing care and attention).

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: A record of what a person's typical eating and drinking capability is, prior to meeting the nurse.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Coded value: Independent (Able to carry out all usual activities). Slight disability (Able to look after own affairs without assistance, but unable to carry out all previous activities.) Moderate disability (Requires some help, but is able to do physically carry out activities unassisted). Moderately severe disability (Unable to attend to needs without assistance). Severe disability (Requires constant nursing care and attention).

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The record of essential physiological measurements, e.g., height, weight, and BMI.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The person's weight in kgs

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The coded value of weight

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT : - 27113001 |Body weight (observable entity)|

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The value of the person's weight

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The units of measure for weight

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: UCUM code

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The position of the person when measuring their weight (e.g. standing, sitting, wheelchair).

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The person's height and length measurement

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The coded value for height/length

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT: - 50373000 |Body height measure (observable entity)| OR 248334005 |Length of body (observable entity)|

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The value of the observation.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The units of measure for height/length

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: UCUM code

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The person's BMI calculation

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The coded value of BMI

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT: - 60621009 |Body mass index (observable entity)|

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The value of the person's BMI

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The units of measure for BMI

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: UCUM code

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: A report on unexplained significant weight loss or gain in the past six months. This may include the type of weight change (loss or gain), a quantifier of weight change (such as the amount/percentage changed, and when the change began.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

Model.name: Infant and young child feeding status

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The feeding status of the person if they are an infant or young child. This will include whether they are breast or bottle fed.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for infant and young child feeding status.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text

TaggedValue.name: description

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: A problem in relation to drinking fluids which needs addressing, and so is important for every professional to know about when seeing the person. Problems may include diagnoses, symptoms, and social or behavioural issues

TaggedValue.value: Coded value for the problem with drinking fluids.

TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT

TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: A record of any equipment or assistance required to eat independently or not independently. This includes any aids used to support an individual to eat and drink independently. E.g. a plate guard, adapted cutlery, spill-proof cups etc.

TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT

TaggedValue.name: description

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT

TaggedValue.name: description

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information about a dental device used by the person, e.g. dentures.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: This is a dental device record entry. There may be 0 to many record entries under a section. Each record entry is made up of a number of elements or data items.

TaggedValue.value: The dental device used by the patient.

TaggedValue.value: The coded value for the dental device used by the patient.

TaggedValue.name: description

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: This is the information of the condition of the person's mouth health effect on their ability to eat and drink. E.g. condition of the teeth, oral infection, ulcers etc.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description

TaggedValue.value: Free text

TaggedValue.name: description

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: A record of the person's desire or inclination to eat. This includes information about factors that can influence appetite, such as hunger, satiety, food preferences, and eating behaviours. This can be used to identify any changes or abnormalities that affect their nutritional intake and health.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for appetite.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Any further comments relating to eating and drinking.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: This is a mobility record entry. There may be 0 to many record entries under a section. Each record entry is made up of a number of elements or data items.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information regarding whether the person is capable of, and typically independently attends to their own mobility and movement.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Coded value: Independent (Able to carry out all usual activities). Slight disability (Able to look after own affairs without assistance, but unable to carry out all previous activities.) Moderate disability (Requires some help, but is able to do physically carry out activities unassisted). Moderately severe disability (Unable to attend to needs without assistance). Severe disability (Requires constant nursing care and attention).

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The record of what a person's typical mobility capability is, prior to meeting the nurse.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Coded value: Independent (Able to carry out all usual activities). Slight disability (Able to look after own affairs without assistance, but unable to carry out all previous activities). Moderate disability (Requires some help, but is able to do physically carry out activities unassisted). Moderately severe disability (Unable to attend to needs without assistance). Severe disability (Requires constant nursing care and attention).

TaggedValue.value: This is an elimination record entry. There may be 0 to many record entries under a section. Each record entry is made up of a number of elements or data items.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information regarding whether the person is capable of, and typically independently attends to their own toileting needs.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Coded value: Independent (Able to carry out all usual activities). Slight disability (Able to look after own affairs without assistance, but unable to carry out all previous activities.) Moderate disability (Requires some help, but is able to do physically carry out activities unassisted). Moderately severe disability (Unable to attend to needs without assistance). Severe disability (Requires constant nursing care and attention).

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: A record of what a person's typical toileting capability is, prior to meeting the nurse.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Coded value: Independent (Able to carry out all usual activities). Slight disability (Able to look after own affairs without assistance, but unable to carry out all previous activities.) Moderate disability (Requires some help, but is able to do physically carry out activities unassisted). Moderately severe disability (Unable to attend to needs without assistance). Severe disability (Requires constant nursing care and attention).

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information regarding whether the person is capable of, and typically independently controls their bladder and/or their bowel on their own accord.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Coded value: Independent (Able to carry out all usual activities). Slight disability (Able to look after own affairs without assistance, but unable to carry out all previous activities.) Moderate disability (Requires some help, but is able to do physically carry out activities unassisted). Moderately severe disability (Unable to attend to needs without assistance). Severe disability (Requires constant nursing care and attention).

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: A record of what a person's typical continence capability is, prior to meeting the nurse.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Coded value: Independent (Able to carry out all usual activities). Slight disability (Able to look after own affairs without assistance, but unable to carry out all previous activities.) Moderate disability (Requires some help, but is able to do physically carry out activities unassisted). Moderately severe disability (Unable to attend to needs without assistance). Severe disability (Requires constant nursing care and attention).

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information relating to the person's bowels.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Any problems or concerns that the patient has in regard to their bowels. This includes if the problem is ongoing or new.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for problems with bowels.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT.

TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The usual consistency of the person's stool. Bristol's stool chart should be used to complete this item.

TaggedValue.value: Coded value for the stool consistency.

TaggedValue.value: Bristol stool chart.

TaggedValue.name: description

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The frequency of how often the person opens their bowls. This can be across different periods of time.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The value of the frequency of bowel opening.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Units of measure of the frequency of bowel opening. E.g. Per day, per 2 days, per week.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: 1. Per day 2. Per 2 days 3. Per week

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The last time the person opened their bowels.

TaggedValue.name: description

TaggedValue.name: description

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Personal Hygiene and Dressing.

Model.name: Personal hygiene and dressing record entry

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: This is a personal hygiene and dressing record entry. There may be 0 to many record entries under a section. Each record entry is made up of a number of elements or data items.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information regarding whether the person is capable of, and typically attends to their own, personal hygiene needs. E.g. washing, showering, bathing, dressing, mouth care, foot and nail care, other.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Coded value: Independent (Able to carry out all usual activities). Slight disability (Able to look after own affairs without assistance, but unable to carry out all previous activities.) Moderate disability (Requires some help, but is able to do physically carry out activities unassisted). Moderately severe disability (Unable to attend to needs without assistance). Severe disability (Requires constant nursing care and attention).

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: A record of what a person's typical personal hygiene and dressing capability is, prior to meeting the nurse.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Coded value: Independent (Able to carry out all usual activities). Slight disability (Able to look after own affairs without assistance, but unable to carry out all previous activities). Moderate disability (Requires some help, but is able to do physically carry out activities unassisted). Moderately severe disability (Unable to attend to needs without assistance). Severe disability (Requires constant nursing care and attention).

Model.name: Problems affecting personal hygiene and dressing

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Any problems that may affect a person's ability to wash or dress, e.g., stroke, weakness, arthritis.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for the problem affecting personal hygiene and dressing.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

Model.name: Personal hygiene and dressing support needs

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Details of any support needed for personal hygiene.

TaggedValue.value: Coded value for any support needed with personal hygiene.

Model.name: Equipment to aid personal hygiene and dressing

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information about any equipment the person uses to support personal care.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Equipment the person uses to support person hygiene and dressing.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for the equipment used to aid personal hygiene and dressing.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: An indication of whether the person has brought their equipment that they require for personal hygiene and / or dressing.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Yes / No.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information regarding the person's mouth and oral care.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information on whether the person's mouth is feeling moist, clean, and comfortable. E.g. no pain, not dry, no soreness.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for the condition of mouth.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: An indication on whether the person is able to clean their teeth, dentures, and mouth without assistance.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Yes or no

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Indication of the condition of the person's nails, including fingers and toes.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for the condition of the person's nails, including fingers and toes.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Any requirements a person has in relation to shaving. This could be for facial or body hair. This may include whether they prefer to shave or not, and where they wish to be shaved.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for any requirements related to shaving.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Any preferences the person has regarding personal hygiene and dressing. This may include product preferences, preference of bath/shower, carer gender preferences, clothing preferences etc. Also, any religious or cultural requirements that need to be considered when delivering care.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

Model.name: Impact of medication on personal hygiene and dressing

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Any impacts of a person's medication on their personal hygiene and dressing. E.g., sweating.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The name of the medication affecting personal hygiene and dressing.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The impact that the medication has on the person's personal hygiene and dressing.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for impact of medication on personal hygiene and dressing.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Any further comments relating to personal hygiene and dressing.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: This is a skin record entry. There may be 0 to many record entries under a section. Each record entry is made up of a number of elements or data items.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Record of the person's skin integrity, and the risks that may compromise skin integrity.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Initial assessment of the person's skin integrity. This may include factors such as cuts, bruises, burns etc.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for the integrity of the skin.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information regarding any risks that may affect skin integrity. This may include the effect of devices, wheelchairs, moisture, footwear etc.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The specific risk to the person's skin integrity. This may include the effect of devices, wheelchairs, moisture, footwear etc.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The coded value for the specific risk to skin integrity.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The history of the person's skin, including other existing skin conditions, previous pressure ulcers, major wounds or skin problems/conditions.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The coded value for skin history.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: A summary of whether the person uses skin care treatments, such as ointments/creams, analgesia products, or wound care products.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Any information that may signify poor circulation in the person, such as: pale/blue skin, pins and needles sensations, cold fingers or toes etc.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for signifiers of poor circulation.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The ability of the person to alter their own positioning.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for the ability to alter own position.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Any further comments relating to skin.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Medication Self-Management.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: This is a medication self-management record entry. There may be 0 to many record entries under a section. Each record entry is made up of a number of elements or data items.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information about whether the person has got their medication with them.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Yes or No

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information about medication administration.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The individual that usually administers the person's medication. This may be themselves, a carer, medical professional, or another person.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The individual that usually administers the young person's medication at nursery/school/college. This may be themselves, a carer, medical professional, or another person.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: A record of any problems that may impact the person's ability to take medication, such as the person's dexterity or visual limitations in relation to personal administration of medications.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for the problems affecting medication management.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Information about any medication organisation equipment that the person has. E.g. a pill / medication organiser / Dosette box / multi-compartment compliance aid.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Coded value for the medication organisation equipment.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: SNOMED CT.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Free text if coded value isn't available.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: A record of when the person last took their medication independently or administered by staff/carer.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The name of the medication.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The time that the person last administered this medication.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Any further comments relating to medication self-management.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Free text.
